title: "Mysterious second writer of Dead Sea Scroll uncovered by AI"
excerpt: "A famous Dead Sea Scroll manuscript was written by not just one but two scribes, according to a new study that used artificial intelligence (AI) and statistics to detect subtle differences in handwriting on the ancient document."
